consultation_guide.title: How Consultations Work
consultation_guide.slide1_desc: Explore our network of verified medical specialists. Filter by specialty, experience, and availability to find the right doctor for your needs.
consultation_guide.slide2_desc: Review each doctor's credentials, education, experience, and consultation pricing before making your choice.
consultation_guide.slide3_desc: Describe your symptoms and medical concerns in detail. Upload relevant medical documents like test results and imaging for a thorough review.
consultation_guide.slide4_desc: Your assigned doctor will carefully analyze your case, reviewing all submitted information and documents.
consultation_guide.slide5_desc: Sometimes doctors need additional information. You'll be notified if they have follow-up questions for a more accurate assessment.
consultation_guide.slide6_desc: Get your detailed medical opinion with diagnosis insights and recommendations to help you make informed health decisions.

help_center.title: Help Center
help_center.subtitle: Guides, FAQs, and support in one place.
help_center.contact_subtitle: Reach out for account, billing, or consultation questions.
help_center.faq_request_question: How do I request a second opinion?
help_center.faq_request_answer: Go to Browse Doctors, pick a specialist, and tap Request Consultation to submit your details.
help_center.faq_documents_question: Do I need to upload medical documents?
help_center.faq_documents_answer: Yes, uploading medical records and test results is required and helps us provide a more accurate opinion.
help_center.faq_timeline_question: When will I get a response?
help_center.faq_timeline_answer: You'll typically receive an update within 1-2 business days. Urgent cases are prioritized when marked as urgent.
help_center.faq_profile_question: How do I update my profile information?
help_center.faq_profile_answer: Open Account > Edit Profile to update your personal details and preferences.
